mapper.select: SELECT "MEMBER".username, MOVIE_DB.movie_title, CASE WHEN INSTR(MOVIE_DB.movie_poster, '|') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(MOVIE_DB.movie_poster, 1, INSTR(MOVIE_DB.movie_poster, '|') - 1) ELSE MOVIE_DB.movie_poster END AS movie_poster FROM MEMBER_CONTENTS INNER JOIN MOVIE_DB ON MEMBER_CONTENTS.movie_num = MOVIE_DB.movie_num INNER JOIN "MEMBER" ON MEMBER_CONTENTS.userid = "MEMBER".userid WHERE MEMBER_CONTENTS.USERID = #{userid}
